title: Junior Data Scientist
description: We are looking for a Junior Data Scientist with experience in Python, pandas, scikit-learn, SQL. Responsibilities include building models, feature engineering, and data visualization. Familiarity with NLP is a plus.

title: NLP Engineer
description: Seeking an NLP engineer experienced with transformers, PyTorch, and productionizing NLP models. Tasks include building semantic search and text classification systems.

title: Data Analyst
description: Role involves SQL, dashboarding (Tableau/PowerBI), and generating business insights from sales datasets. Knowledge of Python for ETL is desirable.
